video.title: DreamWorks Dragons:  Race to the Edge
video.synopsis: From the creators of How to Train Your Dragon comes an all-new Netflix original series that takes Hiccup and Toothless to the edge of adventure!

episodes.synopsis: During their search for the escaped Dagur the Deranged, Hiccup and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object -- one that holds their destiny.
episodes.title: Dragon Eye of the Beholder, Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Hiccup and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island to find the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds the key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.
episodes.title: Dragon Eye of the Beholder, Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: The Dragon Riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive dragon that threatens to trap them forever.
episodes.title: Imperfect Harmony

episodes.synopsis: On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover that the indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.
episodes.title: When Darkness Falls

episodes.synopsis: Thinking he's allergic to his dragon, Fishlegs gets hypnotized. He wakes up transformed into an invincible warrior known as Thor Bonecrusher.
episodes.title: Big Man on Berk

episodes.synopsis: When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup and the Dragon Riders to get him back.
episodes.title: Gone Gustav Gone

episodes.synopsis: Fireworms invade Dragon's Edge, while Ruffnut and Tuffnut discover that they have an unexpected connection to the island.
episodes.title: Reign of Fireworms

episodes.synopsis: As a Rumblehorn wreaks havoc on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup seeks the help of Stoick, who forms an unexpected bond with the rampaging beast.
episodes.title: Crushing It

episodes.synopsis: Fishlegs and Meatlug liberate the Gronckles from a menacing dragon that has encroached on their ancestral home, Dark Deep.
episodes.title: Quake, Rattle and Roll

episodes.synopsis: The Dragon Riders are surprised to discover who is behind recent attacks on nearby ships -- and to learn exactly what the ships are.
episodes.title: Have Dragon Will Travel, Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Heather joins the Dragon Riders, but it's not an easy alliance, especially when Hiccup uncovers a shocking secret about her true identity.
episodes.title: Have Dragon Will Travel, Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: Hiccup and the Dragon Riders rescue a wounded Speed Stinger and take it back to Dragon's Edge, unaware of the dangers that follow.
episodes.title: The Next Big Sting

episodes.synopsis: When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.
episodes.title: Total Nightmare
